channel.title: Client issue
channel.description:
hello there, recently ive been having some weird kind of client issue, with all of the rsc servers ive played,the info doesnt show up and the resolution is kinda weird.. here is a pic: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1z65kcp.jpg[/img]
I hope someone could help me please? thank you :)

item.title: Client issue
item.dc:creator: @i_3hit_u i 3hit u
item.description:
@i_3hit_u wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:25, topic:528314”][quote author=i 3hit u link=topic=647064.msg4354493#msg4354493 date=1377232310]

It’s a client issue…

Well, client is working fine for other players… how come its from the client? O.O
[/quote]

I haven’t been paying attention… you said other clients work for you except this one? It’s the client.[/quote]

What i meant is, in the past everything was working fine, but lately every server i play using their OWN client has the same issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Client issue
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:10, topic:528314”][quote author=i 3hit u link=topic=647064.msg4351950#msg4351950 date=1376802619]

Hmm, the reason I asked was because ever since I updated to Java 8 (beta), I have noticed an increase in resolution to support my high resolution monitor. Maybe try updating your OS? Are your fonts the only thing low resolution? They look really malformed.

well this problem is only with RSC client servers only, other games or when i try rsce’s webclient, its working perfectly
[/quote]That’s because most client’s you’ll find on this website use system fonts, while RSCE uses built in fonts. I made a tutorial on how to implement them, you can find it here https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,531091.msg3879436.html[/quote]

oh, so i called it?

Read full topic

the download link for the fonts in “https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,531091.msg3879436.html” is not working, please fix and thanks for the guide

item.title: Client issue
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:7, topic:528314"][quote author=imthenull link=topic=647064.msg4351935#msg4351935 date=1376798378]
Hmm, the reason I asked was because ever since I updated to Java 8 (beta), I have noticed an increase in resolution to support my high resolution monitor. Maybe try updating your OS? Are your fonts the only thing low resolution? They look really malformed.
[/quote]
Wow, Java 8 already? I feel like Java 7 just came out.[/quote]Oracle is trying to make releases smaller but more frequent (every 2 years or so). Java 8 is coming out on 3/18/14 and Java 9 is scheduled for release in 2016.

Read full topic
